org.mxupdate.eclipse.properties
Class FieldUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.mxupdate.eclipse.properties.FieldUtil

public final class FieldUtil
extends Object

Field utility class for project property page.

Version:
$Id: FieldUtil.java 760 2010-03-14 23:41:22Z tim.moxter $
Author:
The MxUpdate Team

          Defines the width of the labels in the first column.

          Private constructor so that the field utility class could not be initialized.

private static final int LABEL_WIDTH
Defines the width of the labels in the first column.

Constructor Detail

FieldUtil

private FieldUtil()
Private constructor so that the field utility class could not be initialized.

Method Detail

createGroup

public static org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Group createGroup(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite _parent,
                                                        String _labelKey)
Creates a new group composite with four columns in grid layout.

Parameters:
_parent - parent composite where the group is added
_labelKey - key for the label of the group
Returns:
new created group

createComposite

public static org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite createComposite(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite _parent,
                                                                boolean _visible)
Creates a new composite with four columns in grid layout. Depending on _visible the composite is visible (or not).

Parameters:
_parent - parent composite where the composite is added
_visible - true if the composite is visible; false if the composite is not visible
Returns:
new created composite

addBooleanField

public static void addBooleanField(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite _parent,
                                   ProjectProperties _properties,
                                   String _propertyKey,
                                   boolean _default)
Appends a new boolean field. The boolean field has a span of two so that the field is inserted within one line.

Parameters:
_parent - parent composite where the field is added
_properties - properties where to store updated value
_propertyKey - property key
_default - default value of the boolean field

addStringField

public static void addStringField(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite _parent,
                                  ProjectProperties _properties,
                                  String _propertyKey,
                                  String _default)
Appends a new string field.

Parameters:
_parent - parent composite where the field is added
_properties - properties where to store updated value
_propertyKey - property key
_default - default value of the string field

addFileField

public static void addFileField(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite _parent,
                                ProjectProperties _properties,
                                String _propertyKey,
                                String _default,
                                String... _extensions)
Appends a file field with a button to choose a file from the file system.

Parameters:
_parent - parent composite where the field is added
_properties - properties where to store updated value
_propertyKey - property key
_default - default value of the file field
_extensions - allowed extensions of the file (could be null)

addPasswordField

public static void addPasswordField(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite _parent,
                                    ProjectProperties _properties,
                                    String _propertyTextPassword,
                                    String _propertySavePassword)
Appends a password field to the _parent composite. The password field includes a flag if the password is saved in the properties.

Parameters:
_parent - parent composite where the field is added
_properties - properties where to store updated value
_propertyTextPassword - property key where the password is stored
_propertySavePassword - property key for the flag if the password is saved in the properties

addSSHField

public static void addSSHField(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite _parent,
                               ProjectProperties _properties,
                               String _propertyServer,
                               String _propertyPort,
                               int _defaultPort)
Appends a SSH field to the the _parent composite. The SSH field is divided into two fields. The first field defines the name of the SSH server, the second field the port of the SSH server.

Parameters:
_parent - parent composite where the field is added
_properties - properties where to store updated value
_propertyServer - property key for the SSH server name
_propertyPort - property key for the port of the SSH server
_defaultPort - default port of the SSH server
